1. Make sure you have k2 component installed in j1.5 site and its database in not hacked
2. Do things in Readme.txt of redMIGRATOR component
3. Install new version of k2 component (K2_v2.6.7) in new j2.5.x or j3.x
4. Install and enable redmigrator 3rd k2 plugin (plg_redmigrator_k2)
5. If folder {your_j2.5_or_j3_site_root}/media/k2 exist, please delete k2 folder
5. Copy folder {your_j1.5_site_root}/media/k2 to {your_j2.5_or_j3_site_root}/media folder
